about_the_game:
AquaCo is a unique management strategy simulation game where you take on the role of a fishing company manager. Send out ships to fish, process the catch, and generate profits... all while competing against opponents and facing the challenges of nature.

Manage your fleet

Ships are the core of the game. There are multiple types of ships, each designed for different fish species, with varying sizes and uses. Every vessel needs its own crew to operate effectively. 

Harbour

The harbour is the main hub for production management. Here, you can sell fish, set up production, buy new equipment, hire crew, and much more. You can also upgrade the harbour to improve its efficiency.

Realistic Ecosystem

The game world is designed to simulate a realistic ecosystem. It includes weather patterns and sea currents that influence fish behavior, making fishing more challenging.

name: AquaCo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 900 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Take charge as a fishing company manager in a realistic simulator. Plan your catches, trade on a dynamic market, and face ecological challenges. Brave storms, track fish migration and regulations while building your fishing empire.
